align.description: The value is incorporated into the configuration of the placement
align.description_zh: 该值将合并到 placement 的配置中

arrow.description: Modify the display state of the arrows and whether the arrows point to the center of the target element
arrow.description_zh: 修改箭头的显示状态以及修改箭头是否指向目标元素中心

autoAdjustOverflow.description: Automatically adjusts the position of bubbles when they are occluded
autoAdjustOverflow.description_zh: 气泡被遮挡时自动调整位置

defaultOpen.description: Whether it is visible or hidden by default

destroyTooltipOnHide.description: Whether to destroy the Tooltip after closing

getPopupContainer.description: The overlay renders the parent node, which is rendered to the body by default
getPopupContainer.description_zh: 浮层渲染父节点，默认渲染到 body 上

mouseEnterDelay.description: How much delay does it take for the mouse to be moved in before the Tooltip is displayed, in seconds
mouseEnterDelay.description_zh: 鼠标移入后延时多少才显示 Tooltip，单位：秒

mouseLeaveDelay.description: How much delay does it take to hide the tooltip after the mouse is removed, in seconds
mouseLeaveDelay.description_zh: 鼠标移出后延时多少才隐藏 Tooltip，单位：秒

overlayClassName.description: The name of the card class

overlayInnerStyle.description: A style object in the content area of the card
overlayInnerStyle.description_zh: 卡片内容区域的样式对象

placement.description: The bubble box position can be selected as 'top' 'left' 'right' 'bottom' 'topLeft' 'topRight' 'bottomLeft' 'bottomRight' 'leftTop' 'leftBottom' 'rightTop' rightBottom' rightBottom

trigger.description: Trigger behavior, optional 'hover' | focus | click | contextMenu, which can be used to set multiple trigger behaviors using an array
trigger.description_zh: 触发行为，可选 `hover` | focus | click | `contextMenu`，可使用数组设置多个触发行为

open.description: Used to manually control the overlay visibility, less than 4.23.0 uses visible
open.description_zh: 用于手动控制浮层显隐，小于 4.23.0 使用 visible
